import { CircularProgress, Dialog, IconButton, TableCell, TableRow } from "@material-ui/core" import { useState } from "react" import { AiOutlineEdit } from "react-icons/ai" import { BsTrash } from "react-icons/bs" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { deleteCourseGoal } from "../../../services" import { deleteGoalSuccess } from "../../../store/actions/courseGoal.action" const Row = ({ row, mamh }) => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [flag, setFlag] = useState({ type: '' }) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleDelete = async () => { setLoading(true) deleteCourseGoal(mamh, row.muctieu) .then(() => { console.log("DELETE_ROW") dispatch(deleteGoalSuccess(mamh, row.muctieu)) }) .catch(err => { setLoading(false) console.log(err) }) } return ( <> setFlag({ type: '' })}> {deleting && } Xác nhận xóa môn  {row.tenmh} .
{row.muctieu} {row.mota} {row.cdr_ctdt} {loading && } ) } export default Row
